entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING

entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
